alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas and northwestern Morehouse Parishes through 700 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Huttig to Galion. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Crossett around 635 PM CDT. Berlin around 655 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bonita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
